testcase.classname: US_0016 All History dropdown link on the Purchase History page is enabled test
testcase.name: TC_1602 Verification All History dropdown menu on Purchase History page
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser go to url "myUrl"........................................passed Then User clicks on the login link, enters "mailNese" and "passwordNese" and logs in..passed Then User clicks on dashboard link..........................................passed Then User clicks Purchase History section on dashbord page..................passed Then User clicks All History dropdown menu on Purchase History page.........passed Then User verifies All History option on All History dropdown menu is displayed.passed Then User verifies Pending Orders option on All History dropdown menu is displayed.passed Then User verifies Confirmed Orders option on All History dropdown menu is displayed.passed Then User verifies Completed Orders option on All History dropdown menu is displayed.passed Then User verifies Refused Cancelled Orders option on All History dropdown menu is displayed.passed And Closes the page.........................................................passed
